alert.note: Alert for Baker; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NASSAU...EAST CENTRAL BAKER AND NORTHWESTERN DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM EDT... At 1244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maxville, or 16 miles north of Middleburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Maxville, Cisco Gardens, Bryceville, Baldwin, and Whitehouse Air Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
